Title: The Waterboy
Plot: Bobby Boucher is the lowly waterboy for a college football team, until the coach discovers his amazing talent for tackling people much bigger than him. He signs the Waterboy as the new star player, but Bobby must keep it secret from his overbearing and domineering mother.
Tagline: A man with a serious drinking problem
Stars: Adam Sandler, Kathy Bates, Henry Winkler, Fairuza Balk
